Biography

Honors & Awards

• Drafted in the eighth round of the 2019 MLB Draft by the Los Angeles Angels

• NCCSIA All-State Second Team (2019)

• Third Team All-CAA (2019)

• CAA Pitcher of the Week (April 8, 2019)

• CAA Preseason Player of the Year (2019)

• Preseason All-CAA Team (2019)

• NCBWA First Team Preseason All-American (2019)

• Baseball America Third Team Preseason All-American (2019)

• D1Baseball First Team Preseason All-American (2019)

• Perfect Game First Team Preseason All-American (2019)

• Collegiate Baseball First Team Preseason All-American (2019)

• USA Baseball Collegiate National Team (2018)

• Perfect Game/Rawlings First-Team All-American (2018)

• Baseball America Second-Team All-American (2018)

• ABCA/Rawlings Second-Team All-American (2018)

• NCBWA Second-Team All-American (2018)

• D1Baseball Second-Team All-American (2018)

• Atlantic-ABCA/Rawlings All-Region (2018)

• Golden Spikes Award Semifinalist (2018)

• College Baseball Foundation Pitcher of the Year Semifinalist (2018)

• 2017-18 Stein H. Basnight Award (Elon's Top Male Athlete)

• First-team All-CAA (2018)

• First-team NCCSIA All-State (2018)

• CAA All-Tournament Team (2018)

• 2018 Pitcher of the Year (Team Award)

• Collegiate Baseball's National Players of the Week (April 2, 2018)

• CAA co-Pitcher of the Week (April 2, 2018)

• CAA co-Pitcher of the Week (April 23, 2018)

• CAA Pitcher of the Week (May 21, 2018)

• Collegiate Baseball Freshmen All-America Team (2017)

• Second-team NCBWA Freshman All-America Team (2017)

• Second-team D1Baseball Freshman All-America Team (2017)

• CAA Rookie of the Year (2017)

• First-team All-CAA (2017)

• CAA All-Rookie Team (2017)

• 2017 Pitcher of the Year (Team Award)

• 2017 Freshman of the Year (Team Award)

• CAA Rookie of the Week (April 3, 2017)

• CAA co-Pitcher of the Week (April 3, 2017)

• Collegiate Baseball's National Players of the Week (April 10, 2017)

• CAA co-Pitcher of the Week (April 10, 2017)

• CAA Rookie of the Week (May 15, 2017)

2019: Made 14 starts with a 7-3 record and a 3.66 ERA. He allowed 42 runs (35 earned) on 66 hits and 42 walks. He struck out a team-high 110 batters through 86.0 innings pitched...Ranked 36th in the nation in strikeouts per nine innings (11.51) and 40th in total strikeouts...Allowed one run on one hit and a pair of walks while recording nine strikeouts in Elon's season-opening win over Lafayette...Held then-No. 20 Wake Forest to two runs on three hits and four walks in 4.2 innings for a no decision. He tallied five punch outs on the day...Pitched 7.0 complete innings and struck out 12 of the 32 batters he faced in a loss to Bryant...In 7.0 complete innings at Towson, he struck out 10 and gave up one unearned run on two hits and three walks. The effort earned him CAA Pitcher of the Week honors...Earned the win over Northeastern after striking out 13 Huskies across 6.0 complete innings of work. He allowed five runs on four hits and five walks...Went 8.0 complete innings and allowed two runs on seven hits and a walk in Elon's CAA Tournament win over William & Mary.

2018: First-team All-CAA … Named to the USA Baseball Collegiate National Team …Selected as a first-team All-American by Perfect Game/Rawlings … Chosen as a second-team All-American by Baseball America, the ABCA, NCBWA and D1Baseball … Named a semifinalist for the Golden Spikes Award … Named a semifinalist for the College Baseball Foundation's Pitcher of the Year Award … Recipient of Elon's Stein H. Basnight Award as the department's top male athlete … First-team NCCSIA All-State selection … Made 15 appearances, all starts … Went 8-2 with a 1.71 ERA … Struck out a program-record 147 hitters in 105.0 innings … Strikeout total is the second-most in CAA history … Held opponents to a .159 batting average … Allowed one run and struck out nine hitters in 5.0 innings against Penn State … Fanned 11 hitters and gave up one run in 7.2 innings to earn the win against Marshall … Struck out 12 hitters and allowed two hits over 7.0 shutout innings in a win over Appalachian State … Picked up the win after giving up two runs and striking out a season-high 13 hitters in 7.0 innings against Rider … Named co-CAA Pitcher of the Week and one of Collegiate Baseball's National Players of the Week on April 2 after striking out a season-high 14 hitters and allowing one run on two hits over 7.1 innings in a win over #30 College of Charleston … Surrendered one earned run and fanned 10 in 6.2 innings at Northeastern … Fanned 12 and allowed one run on two hits in 7.0 innings against Hofstra … Named CAA co-Pitcher of the Week after he struck out 14 and allowed one unearned run on three hits in a complete game win over Hartford … Set Elon's single-season strikeout record when he fanned three at UNCW … Allowed two runs and struck out 10 in 7.0 innings in a win at Delaware … Gave up just one unearned run on one hit and struck out eight in 7.0 innings in win over Towson … Surrendered one unearned run on three hits and fanned nine in 8.0 innings in a victory over William & Mary to earn CAA Pitcher of the Week honors … Struck out six in 8.2 innings in a no-decision against College of Charleston in the CAA Tournament to earn a spot on the all-tournament team.

2017: CAA Rookie of the Year … Named to the Collegiate Baseball Freshmen All-America Team … Selected as a second-team Freshman All-American by both the NCBWA and D1Baseball … First-team All-CAA and CAA All-Rookie Team honoree … Made 14 starts and 15 total appearances … Went 6-5 with a team-best 3.10 ERA … Struck out 103 hitters in 90.0 innings of work, ranking second in the league in Ks and third in innings pitched … Held opponents to a .204 batting average, tied for third in the league … Strikeout total ranked fourth on the program's single-season list … Tied the program NCAA Division I freshman record for wins and set the new program Division I standard for strikeouts … Had a streak of 20.2 scoreless innings during the season … Struck out three in 3.0 innings in his collegiate debut against Longwood … Fanned five hitters in 4.1 innings at #12 Clemson … Tossed 6.0 innings and allowed just one unearned run on three hits while striking out nine in a no-decision against UMass … Earned the first win of his career against VMI after allowing one run on three hits and striking out nine in 6.0 innings … Fanned six and scattered three hits over 6.2 shutout innings in a no-decision against Northeastern … Named CAA co-Pitcher of the Week and Rookie of the Week after tossing a complete game, two-hit shutout in which he struck out six against James Madison … Named one of Collegiate Baseball's National Players of the Week and earned CAA Rookie of the Week honors after striking out 15 hitters and allowing three runs in 8.1 innings in a win at William & Mary … His 15 Ks against the Tribe were the most by an Elon pitcher since March 30, 2007 … Allowed one run and struck out seven to pick up a win at Towson … Struck out eight over 5.0 scoreless innings to earn the win over Delaware … Named CAA Rookie of the Week after striking out 10 and allowing three runs in 8.0 innings in a win over UNCW.

Prep: Selected as the 2016 Georgia 6A Region Pitcher of the Year … Was a 2016 first-team all-state selection as a pitcher and a 2015 second-team all-state pick as a hitter … As a senior for coach Dallas McPherson, posted an 8-2 record and struck out 135 hitters, the most in Georgia, in 72 innings … Two-time team MVP … Hit .326 with three home runs and a .443 on-base percentage as a senior … Helped his prep squad to 2014 and 2015 Georgia 6A state titles and a 2016 Georgia 6A regional crown … Was an all-state selection … Rated as the 16th-best prospect in the state of Georgia by MaxPreps.

Personal: Kyle Griffin Brnovich is the son of Sam and Cathy Brnovich … Brother Tyler played baseball at Concordia University … Born October 20, 1997.

No stats available for the current season.
